title: Dow futures rise 270 points Thursday evening as stock-market bulls brace for final test of week from Friday jobs report
text: U.S. stock-index futures climbed higher Thursday evening in light trading as investors readied for another test of the bullish momentum that has produced gains in two of the past three sessions for the S&P 500 and the Dow, powered by rallies in energy and technology-related firms.

title: Oil gains on hopes that easing of coronavirus curbs will trigger demand boost
